meanings.sent1: She is very antihunting and believes animals should be protected.
meanings.sent2: The antihunting campaign gained support from many animal lovers.
meanings.sent3: The antihunting protesters held up signs with powerful messages.
meanings.sent4: Her antihunting stance was as firm as a mountain refusing to move.
meanings.sent5: The antihunting movement grew stronger with each passing day.

meanings.definition: A person or group who is against hunting.
meanings.sent1: The antihunting spokeperson gave a passionate speech at the rally.
meanings.sent2: Many antihunting organizations work together to protect wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The antihunting club hosted a fundraiser to support their cause.
meanings.sent4: She was a dedicated antihunting advocate, always speaking up for animals.
meanings.sent5: The antihunting community united to make their voices heard.
